title: WCAS POLI_SCI 390-0-23 Special Topics in Political Science
topic: Rebellions and Revolutions in the Middle East

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Nader Sohrabi, Winter 2016, "Rebellions and Revolutions in the Middle East"
Recent headlines give the impression that religion has always been central in the Middle Eastern upheavals. This course takes a long-term view of social movements, rebellions, and revolutions in the Middle East to contextualize the religious turn. Sociological concepts and comparison help us in evaluating their changing form in the past century up to the present. Events in Turkey, Iran, and Arab states provide the basis for exploration.

subject: POLI_SCI
